main event: An unidentified aerial object was tracked over Bornholm, Denmark on August 5, 1956, utilizing ground radar.
interesting points: The radar tracks indicated an object orbiting over one spot at a speed of 700 knots, without any trailing signature., There were no known aircraft in the area during the observation period., The radar track lasted for approximately one hour., The survey region was located about 20 miles southwest of Christianso, Denmark., There were indications of possible temperature inversions affecting radar readings, suggesting environmental factors may have been involved.
sighted object: An unidentified aerial object tracked on radar
witness description: No specific witnesses were mentioned in the documentation.
